name: Siddharth Kumar Gururani
body:
#Portfolio

This page consists of a list of some of my work in the field of Music Technology, specifically in Music Information Retrieval. Following that, there is a section containing some music played by me on the guitar to demonstrate my ability.

##Projects in Music Technology

###Rhythm Extraction
This is a project I worked on during my summer internship at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) under the guidance of Professor Pascale Fung.

###Anomaly Detection
Another of my projects at HKUST.

###Feature Importance in Diurnal and Seasonal Classification of Ragas
This is my ongoing master's thesis at Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur. This project combines elements of Computational Musicology and MIR.

##Music
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
